title: Yes Bank appoints veteran banker Sumit Bali to head its retail business
description: Sumit Bali has been appointed by Yes Bank to head its retail business and collections from August 26. With extensive experience in retail banking, Bali joins Yes Bank after his tenure at Axis Bank. His appointment comes at a critical time as Yes Bank is in talks with Sumitomo Mitsui and Emirates for a stake acquisition.
